00058 void IPAddress::Serialize(const int fd) const
00059 {
00060     if (writeall(fd, (const char *)&addr, sizeof(addr)) != sizeof(addr)) {
00061         throw SerializationException();
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void IPAddress::Unserialize(const int fd)
00066 {
00067     if (readall(fd, (char *)&addr, sizeof(addr)) != sizeof(addr)) {
00068         throw SerializationException();
00069     }
00070 }

00072 std::ostream & IPAddress::Print(std::ostream &os) const
00073 {
00074     struct in_addr in;
00075     in.s_addr = htonl(addr);
00076     os << "IPAddress(" << inet_ntoa(in) << ")";
00077     return os;
00078 }

00081 static unsigned short ip_id_counter = 0;
00082 
00083 
00084 IPHeader::IPHeader() : Header(Headers::IPHeader)
00085 {
00086     SetVersion(IP_HEADER_REQUIRED_VERSION);
00087     SetHeaderLength(IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH_IN_WORDS);  // 20 bytes, 5 words
00088     SetTOS(IP_HEADER_DEFAULT_TOS);
00089     SetTotalLength(IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH);
00090     SetID(ip_id_counter++);
00091     SetFlags(IP_HEADER_FLAG_DEFAULT);
00092     SetFragOffset(0);
00093     SetTTL(IP_HEADER_TTL_DEFAULT);
00094     SetProtocol(IP_PROTO_RAW);
00095     SetSourceIP(IPAddress(0U));
00096     SetDestIP(IPAddress(0U));
00097     RecomputeChecksum();
00098 }

00123 // This is a helper to determine the header length prior to
00124 // extracting it
00125 // The assumption is that the ethernet header has already been stripped.
00126 unsigned IPHeader::EstimateIPHeaderLength(Packet &p)
00127 {
00128     unsigned char len;
00129     Buffer &b = p.GetPayload();
00130 
00131     b.GetData((char *)&len, 1, 0);
00132 
00133     len &= 0xf;
00134 
00135     len *= 4;
00136 
00137     return len;
00138 }

00140 // 4 bit version fields
00141 // automatically set to
00142 void IPHeader::GetVersion(unsigned char &version) const
00143 {
00144     GetData((char *)&version, 1, 0);
00145     version &= 0xf0;
00146     version >>= 4;
00147 }
00148 
00149 
00150 void IPHeader::SetVersion(const unsigned char &version)
00151 {
00152     unsigned char t;
00153 
00154     GetData((char *)&t, 1, 0);
00155     t = (t & 0x0f) | ((version << 4) & 0xf0);
00156     SetData((char *)&t, 1, 0);
00157 
00158     RecomputeChecksum();
00159 }
00160 
00161 void IPHeader::GetHeaderLength(unsigned char &hlen) const
00162 {
00163     GetData((char *)&hlen, 1, 0);
00164     hlen &= 0x0f;
00165 }
00166 
00167 // note that the header length is recomputed automatically
00168 void IPHeader::SetHeaderLength(const unsigned char &hlen)
00169 {
00170     unsigned char t;
00171 
00172     GetData((char *)&t, 1, 0);
00173     t = (t & 0xf0) | (hlen & 0x0f);
00174     SetData((char *)&t, 1, 0);
00175 
00176     RecomputeChecksum();
00177 }

00184 void IPHeader::SetTOS(const unsigned char &tos)
00185 {
00186     SetData((char *)&tos, 1, 1);
00187     RecomputeChecksum();

00190 void IPHeader::GetTotalLength(unsigned short &len) const
00191 {
00192     GetData((char *)&len, 2, 2);
00193     len=ntohs(len);
00194 }
00195 
00196 // note that total length is automatically computed
00197 void IPHeader::SetTotalLength(const unsigned short &len)
00198 {
00199     unsigned short l = htons(len);
00200 
00201     SetData((char *)&l, 2, 2);
00202 
00203     RecomputeChecksum();

00222 void IPHeader::GetFlags(unsigned char &flags) const
00223 {
00224     GetData((char *)&flags, 1, 6);
00225     flags = (0x7 & (flags >> 5));
00226 }
00227 
00228 void IPHeader::SetFlags(const unsigned char &flags)
00229 {
00230     unsigned char t;
00231 
00232     GetData((char *)&t, 1, 6);
00233     t &= 0x1f;
00234     t |= ((0x7 & flags) << 5);
00235     SetData((char *)&t, 1, 6);
00236 
00237     RecomputeChecksum();
00238 }
00239 
00240 void IPHeader::GetFragOffset(unsigned short &offset) const
00241 {
00242     GetData((char *)&offset, 2, 6);
00243 
00244     offset = ntohs(offset);
00245     offset &= 0x1fff;
00246 }
00247 
00248 
00249 void IPHeader::SetFragOffset(const unsigned short &offset)
00250 {
00251     unsigned char f;
00252     unsigned short o = htons(offset);
00253 
00254     GetFlags(f);
00255     SetData((char *)&o, 2, 6);
00256     SetFlags(f);
00257 
00258     RecomputeChecksum();
00259 }

00285 unsigned short IPHeader::ComputeChecksum() const
00286 {
00287     unsigned short buf[IP_HEADER_MAX_LENGTH / 2];
00288     unsigned char len;
00289 
00290     GetHeaderLength(len);
00291     len *= 4;
00292 
00293     GetData((char *)buf, len, 0);
00294 
00295     return ~(OnesComplementSum(buf, len / 2));
00296 }
00297 
00298 
00299 bool IPHeader::IsChecksumCorrect() const
00300 {
00301     return ComputeChecksum() == 0;
00302 }
00303 
00304 void IPHeader::RecomputeChecksum()
00305 {
00306     SetChecksum(0);
00307     SetChecksum(ComputeChecksum());
00308 }
00309 
00310 void IPHeader::GetChecksum(unsigned short &checksum) const
00311 {
00312     GetData((char *)&checksum, 2, 10);
00313     checksum = ntohs(checksum);
00314 }
00315 
00316 // Note that this will be recomputed every time one of the set calls is run
00317 void IPHeader::SetChecksum(const unsigned short &checksum)
00318 {
00319     unsigned short c = htons(checksum);
00320     SetData((char *)&c, 2, 10);
00321 }

00323 void IPHeader::GetSourceIP(IPAddress &addr) const
00324 {
00325     GetData(&addr, 4, 12);
00326     addr = ntohl(addr);
00327 }
00328 
00329 void IPHeader::SetSourceIP(const IPAddress &addr)
00330 {
00331     unsigned a = htonl(addr);
00332     SetData((char *)&a, 4, 12);
00333     RecomputeChecksum();
00334 }
00335 
00336 void IPHeader::GetDestIP(IPAddress &addr) const
00337 {
00338     GetData(&addr, 4, 16);
00339     addr = ntohl(addr);
00340 }
00341 
00342 void IPHeader::SetDestIP(const IPAddress &addr)
00343 {
00344     unsigned a = htonl(addr);
00345 
00346     SetData((char *)&a, 4, 16);
00347 
00348     RecomputeChecksum();
00349 }

00351 
00352 void IPHeader::GetOptions(IPOptions &opt) const
00353 {
00354     unsigned char len;
00355 
00356     GetHeaderLength(len);
00357     len = len * 4;
00358 
00359     if (len > IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH) {
00360         GetData(opt.data, len - IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH, IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH);
00361         opt.len = len - IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH;
00362     } else {
00363         opt.len = 0;
00364     }
00365 }
00366 
00367 
00368 void IPHeader::SetOptions(const IPOptions &opt)
00369 {
00370     SetData(opt.data, opt.len, IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH);
00371 
00372     short len = (IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH + opt.len) / 4;
00373     SetHeaderLength(len);
00374 
00375     RecomputeChecksum();
00376 }
00377 
00378 
00379 std::ostream & IPHeader::Print(std::ostream &os) const
00380 {
00381     bool isvalidchecksum;
00382     unsigned char version, hlen, tos, flags, ttl, proto;
00383     unsigned short len, id, fragoff, checksum, computedchecksum;
00384     IPAddress src, dest;
00385 
00386     GetVersion(version);
00387     GetHeaderLength(hlen);
00388     GetTOS(tos);
00389     GetTotalLength(len);
00390     GetID(id);
00391     GetFlags(flags);
00392     GetFragOffset(fragoff);
00393     GetTTL(ttl);
00394     GetProtocol(proto);
00395     GetChecksum(checksum);
00396     GetSourceIP(src);
00397     GetDestIP(dest);
00398 
00399     isvalidchecksum = IsChecksumCorrect();
00400 
00401     computedchecksum = ComputeChecksum();
00402 
00403     os << "IPHeader"
00404        << "( version=" << unsigned(version)
00405        << ", hlen=" << unsigned(hlen) << " (" << unsigned(hlen) * 4 << ")"
00406        << ", tos="  << unsigned(tos)
00407        << ", len="  << len
00408        << ", id="   << id
00409        << ", flags=" << unsigned(flags) 
00410        << "("
00411        << ((flags & IP_HEADER_FLAG_RESERVED) ? "RESERVED " : "")
00412        << ((flags & IP_HEADER_FLAG_DONTFRAG) ? "DO NOT FRAGMENT " : "OK TO FRAGMENT ")
00413        << ((flags & IP_HEADER_FLAG_MOREFRAG) ? "MORE FRAGMENTS" : "NO MORE FRAGMENTS") 
00414        << ")"
00415        << ", fragoff=" << fragoff
00416        << ", ttl=" << unsigned(ttl)
00417        << ", proto=" << unsigned(proto) 
00418        << "("
00419        << ((proto == IP_PROTO_UDP) ? "UDP" :
00420            (proto == IP_PROTO_TCP) ? "TCP" :
00421            (proto == IP_PROTO_ICMP) ? "ICMP" :
00422            (proto == IP_PROTO_RAW) ? "RAW" :
00423            (proto == IP_PROTO_IP) ? "IP" : 
00424            "UNKNOWN") 
00425        << ")"
00426        << ", checksum=" << checksum << (isvalidchecksum ? "(valid)" : "(INVALID)")
00427        << ", computedchecksum=" << computedchecksum
00428        << ", src=" << src
00429        << ", dst=" << dest
00430        << (((hlen * 4) > IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH) ? "OPTIONS" : "noopts") 
00431        << " )";
00432 
00433     return os;
00434 }
